page.title: 15ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: {GROUP OF YOUNG MEN INCLUDING VISCOUNT {LINLEY,SON OF THE QUEENS SISTER HRH {PRINCESS MARGARET,HAVE SET UP A WOOD {CRAFT WORKSHOP IN BETCHWORTH BY THE {CHURCH MAKING SPECIAL TO ORDER {FURNITURE.WORK SEEN,BEAUTIFULLY DONE. BLACKSMITH WHO WORKS THE 300yr OLD FORGE IN BETCHWORTH,Mr F A STOVEL IS 81yrs OLD.{SILK SCREENER IS NEXT DOOR. FORGE OWNED BY HON.JAMES HAMILTON AS IS THE BETCHWORTH ESTATE ON WHICH ARE PRACTICED MANY FOWLING AND FISHING CRAFTS;SEE LANDSCAPE&HOUSING.SEE ENTRY FOR SHROPSHIRE FOR HAMILTON AGAIN.{THE {MAKING OF CORN DOLLIES,BREAD ANIMALS & {SOME THATCHING IS DONE. }ART AND CRAFT LESSONS ARE AVIALABLE AT EVENING CLASS {BARNS/COTTAGES HAVE BEEN PRESERVED RE- {BUILT AS NEAR ORIGINAL AS REGULATIONS {PERMIT.}LONG GONE ARE STOOKS OF CORN & GLEANING IN THE WAKE OF A HORSE DRAWN HARVESTER.AREA KEEPS AS MUCH AS IT CAN
